ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived
ModMetaData.author: zymex
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>Incompatible mods:</size> - Mend and Recycle (only on assemblers) - Technology Blueprints & Reverse Engineering (t3 miner bill option) - Startup impact (only if mod settings are used) - Apothecary (wont work with cultivators) see more info here: https://github.com/zymex22/Project-RimFactory-Revived/wiki/Issues
[Link to GitHub] https://github.com/zymex22/Project-RimFactory-Revived
[Link to Steampage] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=203397970 See steampage for More info.
